author: pbs.org
title: PBS NewsHour full episode October 9, 2015 PBS NewsHour
text: Friday on the NewsHour, the Pentagon cancels a program to train Syrian rebels fighting the Islamic State. Also: Republicans struggle to find a new Speaker of the House, Mark Shields and David Brooks discuss the weekâ€™s news, health effects of gold mining in the developing world, a look at how skin color affects perception of racial tension and a battle in San Francisco over keeping dogs on leash.
